list.description:
Get the first element in the document matching selector.
Shorthand for `querySelector`.

Get all elements in the document matching selector.
Shorthand for `querySelectorAll`

list.title: addClass
list.description: Add a CSS class name to an element.

list.title: attr
list.description:
Set attribute `name` to `val`, or get attr `name`.
Derived from: github.com/bpmn-io/min-dom/blob/master/lib/attr.js

list.title: base64ToBlob
list.description: Converts a Base64 encoded string to a Blob object

list.title: buildQuery
list.description: Build a query string from an object of data.

list.title: clone
list.description: Creates an immutable clone of an object.

list.title: dedupe
list.description:
Remove duplicate items from an array.
Creates a new array with duplicate items removed.
Adapted from: (c) 2019 Chris Ferdinandi, MIT License
https://gomakethings.com

list.title: domify
list.description:
Convert an HTML string to a DOM object.
Parses an HTML string and returns the first child element of the resulting DOM tree.

list.title: endsWith
list.description: Check if a string ends with a specified substring, case-insensitive.

list.title: entityMap
list.description: Map of special characters to their corresponding HTML entities.

list.title: escapeHTML
list.description: Escape special characters in an HTML string.

list.title: filter
list.description: Create a new object composed of properties that meet specific criteria.

list.title: filter~filtered
list.description: A new object that will hold properties that pass the given test.

list.title: findUsernames
list.description:
Searches and returns a string for any social accounts
Adapted from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15265605/how-to-pull-mentions-out-of-strings-like-twitter-in-javascript
Full/Official version: https://github.com/twitter/twitter-text

list.title: formatBytes
list.description: Format bytes into a human-readable string with unit.

list.title: fromArray
list.description: Converts an array to a comma-separated string

list.title: fromBase64
list.description: Decodes a Base64 encoded string to ASCII

list.title: getAvailablePort
list.description: Finds an available port for listening.

list.title: getAvailablePort~getNextAvailablePort
list.description: Find the next available port by creating a temporary server and checking for errors.

list.title: getContrast
list.description: Find the appropriate contrast color (either black or white) for a given hex code.

list.title: getCustomCSSVariables
list.description:
Return all custom variables from the document.
Derived from: stackoverflow.com/questions/45763121/list-css-custom-properties-css-variables

list.title: getDataAttributes
list.description: Returns all HTML `data-*` attributes attached to an element.

list.title: getDirectory
list.description: Recursively reads a directory and returns an array of all files.

list.title: getDirectoryTree
list.description: Recursively reads a directory and returns an array of all files.

list.title: getFileType
list.description: Returns the type of a file based on its extension

list.title: getLanguage
list.description: Get the browser's language.

list.title: getMessage
list.description: Get a message based on the provided language.

list.title: getQueryString
list.description: Get the value of a query string from a URL.

list.title: getURLParams
list.description: Get the URL parameters from a given URL string.

list.title: has
list.description: Return true, if target owns a property with the given key.

list.title: hasClass
list.description: Check if an element has a given CSS class name.

list.title: isBrowser
list.description: Determine if the code is running in a browser environment.

list.title: isDefined
list.description: Checks if a value is defined.

list.title: isDirectory
list.description: Determines if a given file in a directory is a directory itself.

list.title: isDirectory
list.description: Determines if a given file in a directory is a directory itself.

list.title: isJSON
list.description: Safely verifies input argument is valid JSON.

list.title: isNil
list.description: Checks if `value` is `null` or `undefined`.

list.title: isNull
list.description: Checks if `value` is `null`.

list.title: isS3
list.description: Check if the given path is a valid S3 path.

list.title: isServer
list.description: Determine if the code is running in a server (non-browser) environment.

list.title: isUndefined
list.description: Checks if `value` is `undefined`.

list.title: isValidHexSimpleColor
list.description: Check if a given color string is a valid simple color.

list.title: parseJSONFromBytes
list.description: Parses a JSON string from a Buffer or byte array

list.title: parseS3
list.description: Parse an S3 path and return the bucket and key.

list.title: pick
list.description: Creates a new object composed of properties picked from another object.

list.title: readFile
list.description: Reads a file and returns a promise that resolves with the file's contents.

list.title: reloadPageWhenOnline
list.description: Reload the page when the connection is back to get back to the app.

list.title: removeClass
list.description: Remove a CSS class name from an element.

list.title: sh
list.description: Executes a shell command and returns it as a Promise.

list.title: sleep
list.description: Pause the execution of code for a specified duration.

list.title: startsWith
list.description: Determines if a haystack string starts with a specified needle substring, case-insensitive.

list.title: toBase64
list.description: Encodes a string to Base64

list.title: toggleClass
list.description: Toggle a CSS class name from an element.
